name: Ext_R5_Encounter_class
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Encounter.class for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Encounter.class from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Encounter|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Classification of patient encounter context - e.g. Inpatient, outpatient
element.definition: Concepts representing classification of patient encounter such as ambulatory (outpatient), inpatient, emergency, home health or others due to local variations.
element.comment: `Encounter.class` maps to R4B `Encounter`. To multiple elements in Encounter: (`Encounter`, `Encounter.class`). Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `Encounter.class` maps to R4B `Encounter.class`. Has no type mapping Changed from an array to a single value (max cardinality from * to 1). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
